task.title: Restrict Directory Information
task.shortdesc: You have the right to restrict all or part of your directory information, which includes your preferred email, your enrollment status (full-time/part-time), major field of study, and more.

prereq.p: You must be logged in to MyPack Portal.

step.info: Located in the left-hand navigatio menu

step.note: Select a “full privacy” block to prevent us from sharing your information with anyone, including employers. A full privacy block also prevents your inclusion in graduation and Dean’s List publications.
step.cmd: If you choose a Full Privacy Block, grant any exceptions for certain publications:

substep.cmd: Click the Full Privacy Block field
Select the Exceptions you would like to grant.
